snippet.title: Forge of the Fae - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/datadyne/forge-of-the-fae

Forge of the Fae will have a Kickstarter at the end of September. Thank you so much to everyone who has helped spread the word!

Wishlist Forge of the Fae on Steam to make sure you are notified when the game comes out!

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2160070/Forge_of_the_Fae/

---

Forge of the Fae - Explore a story-rich, mysterious world inspired by Celtic folklore, use crystals to channel powerful magic, and make impactful choices that change the story's outcome. A unique Crystal System and battles with dangerous Fae await in this charming, pixel art, retro modern RPG.
